  • Method Details

    • registerCourse

      public boolean registerCourse(Course course)
      Registers a new course into the system.
      Parameters:
      course - The course object to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the course was successfully registered, false if it already exists.

    • registerProfessor

      public boolean registerProfessor(Professor professor)
      Registers a new professor, validating their email and uniqueness.
      Parameters:
      professor - The professor object to be registered.
      Returns:
      true if the professor was successfully registered, false otherwise.

    • registerProject

      public void registerProject(Project project)
      Registers a new project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to be added.

    • getCourseByCode

      public Course getCourseByCode(String code)
      Retrieves a course by its unique code.
      Parameters:
      code - The code of the course.
      Returns:
      The matching Course object or null if not found.

    • getProfessorById

      public Professor getProfessorById(String id)
      Retrieves a professor by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the professor.
      Returns:
      The matching Professor object or null if not found.

    • getProjectById

      public Project getProjectById(String id)
      Retrieves a project by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project.
      Returns:
      The matching Professor object or null if not found.

    • addResultToProject

      public boolean addResultToProject(String projectId, Result result)
      Adds a result to a project if possible.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project.
      result - The result to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the result was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • getProjectsWithoutResults

      public List<Project> getProjectsWithoutResults()
      Gets all projects that do not have any associated results.
      Returns:
      A list of projects without results.

    • searchProjectsByCourseName

      public List<Project> searchProjectsByCourseName(String courseName)
      Searches for projects whose course name contains the given string.
      Parameters:
      courseName - The course name or part of it.
      Returns:
      A list of matching projects.

    • searchProjectsByKeyword

      public List<Project> searchProjectsByKeyword(String keyword)
      Searches for projects containing a keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of projects that include the keyword.

    • modifyProject

      public boolean modifyProject(String projectId, String name, List<String> companies, String semester, String type, List<String> keywords, String description, String statementLink)
      Modifies project general information.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to modify.
      name - The new project name.
      companies - New list of companies.
      semester - The updated semester.
      type - Updated project type.
      keywords - New keywords list.
      description - New description.
      statementLink - New statement link.
      Returns:
      true if the project was modified successfully, false otherwise.

    • deleteDeliverable

      public boolean deleteDeliverable(String resultId, String projectId, String deliverableType)
      Logically deletes a deliverable from a project's result.
      Parameters:
      resultId - The ID of the result.
      projectId - The ID of the project.
      deliverableType - The type of deliverable to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the deliverable was found and deleted, false otherwise.

    • isValidEmail

      public boolean isValidEmail(String email)
      Validates the format of an email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to validate.
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise.

    • isValidURL

      public boolean isValidURL(String url)
      Validates that the URL belongs to accepted platforms.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to validate.
      Returns:
      true if it's valid for GitHub, Drive, etc.

    • loadDemoData

      public void loadDemoData()
      Loads a predefined set of data for testing purposes.

    • loadFromCSV

      public void loadFromCSV(String filepath) throws IOException
      Loads course, professor, and project data from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The path to the CSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be read.

    • getCourses

      public List<Course> getCourses()
      Gets the list of registered courses.
      Returns:
      List of courses.

    • getProfessors

      public List<Professor> getProfessors()
      Gets the list of registered professors.
      Returns:
      List of professors.

    • getProjects

      public List<Project> getProjects()
      Gets the list of registered projects.
      Returns:
      List of projects.

    • exportCourseProjectsToTxt

      public void exportCourseProjectsToTxt(String courseCode) throws IOException
      Exports all projects associated with a given course into a .txt file.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The code of the course to export.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be created.
      IllegalArgumentException - if course is not found.
